channel.title: railswaycon on Leonardo Borges
channel.description: Recent content in railswaycon on Leonardo Borges

item.title: railswaycon jruby internals by ola bini
item.description: As always I expected a good talk from Ola and once more he delivered it. But this one was different. It might have been even boring to some ruby developers since we saw a fair amount of java code in this presentation. Ola gave us a tour through the main classes that make JRuby possible with a single purpose: so we can check out the code and hack ourselves. You can download his slides here.
